name: The Quiet Jewel
notes: Single G star; one habitable world; sparse settlements; easy onboarding.

name: Red Dwarf Twilight
notes: M star; tidally locked habitable world; strange biospheres and cults.

name: Graveyard Sun
notes: White dwarf; ruins; habitats; salvage economy; high hazards.

name: Three Suns, One War
notes: Trinary; contested trade lanes; pirates; faction clocks.

name: Ocean of Knives
notes: Ocean world; deep horrors; floating city-states; biotech.
